thread.title: Disney names treasurer Christine McCarthy as CFO
thread.title_full: Disney names treasurer Christine McCarthy as CFO

title: Disney names treasurer Christine McCarthy as CFO
text:
You have successfully emailed the post. Disney names treasurer Christine McCarthy as CFO Jun. 30, 2015, 2:18 PM 37 
Thomson Reuters The entrance gate to The Walt Disney Co is pictured in Burbank 
(Reuters) - Walt Disney Co said it named Christine McCarthy as its chief financial officer. 
McCarthy had previously served as Disney's treasurer over the past 15 years. 
Disney said in June that James Rasulo, a 29-year veteran of the media company, would step down as CFO at the end of the month. 
(Reporting by Anya George Tharakan in Bengaluru; Editing by Joyjeet Das) Read the original article on Reuters . Copyright 2015. Follow Reuters on Twitter . More from Reuters:
